description.value: By drawing upon the First World's magic, you can siphon a portion of that malleable world to create a convincing illusion. Once per day, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Illusory Disguise], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Item Facade], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Ventriloquism]. At 7th level, the spell is heightened to 2nd level, and every 2 levels thereafter, the spell is heightened an additional spell level.
